table.title: Overview
table.searchString: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=Runtime" |eval startedAt_secs=floor(startedAt/1000) | eval formattedJVMStartTime=strftime(startedAt_secs,"%H:%M:%S %d %B %Y") |stats first(jvmName) as "JVM Name" first(jvmVersion) as "JVM Version" first(jvmVendor) as "JVM Vendor" first(jvmProcessName) as "JVM Process" first(formattedJVMStartTime) as "JVM Start Time" by host jvmDescription

chart.title: JVM Uptime
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=Runtime" | chart max(eval(jvmUptime/1000/60)) as "Uptime in Minutes" by host,jvmDescription
